channel.title: [Important] Error Connecting to Server [Help] [Must Read]
channel.description:
[center]Okay, I have downloaded a Client and Source and the only problem is that i can't get it running. I downloaded no-ip and i have a host ready. Thats all set. Now, I went to Client.Java and Ctrl F and did 'Server =' and changed most of the ip to my no-ip. i did it on both client.java and gui.java i searched the whole file for any other files to changed and its all set. Now, I downloaded Utorrent (I am not familiar with Utorrent at all) So i changed the Preference and changed the Port to 43594. Then, I ran the Source>Ran Utorrent>Running Client. and it still says Error Connect to server. Now, also I really need help with that. I also tried to Portforward and I need help with that. So Skype is really the best way to help me out. Also, I will share my screen with you and you just explain to me whatever.
Please help this guy out. ;)
Post below your Skype and i will add you as soon as possible. Thanks. [/center]

item.title: [Important] Error Connecting to Server [Help] [Must Read]
item.dc:creator: @yesimanub yesimanub
item.description:
@yesimanub wrote:

if your home hosting it make 2 copies.
1 copy is for you and the ip is set to 127.0.0.1 or local
the 2nd copy is for you players and is set to the no-ip.

hope i helped

Read full topic

item.title: [Important] Error Connecting to Server [Help] [Must Read]
item.dc:creator: @King_Joey King Joey
item.description:
@King_Joey wrote:

[center]Okay, I have downloaded a Client and Source and the only problem is that i can’t get it running.
I downloaded no-ip and i have a host ready. Thats all set.
Now, I went to Client.Java and Ctrl F and did ‘Server =’ and changed most of the ip to my no-ip.
i did it on both client.java and gui.java i searched the whole file for any other files to changed and its all set.
Now, I downloaded Utorrent (I am not familiar with Utorrent at all) So i changed the Preference and changed the Port to 43594.
Then, I ran the Source>Ran Utorrent>Running Client. and it still says Error Connect to server.
Now, also I really need help with that. I also tried to Portforward and I need help with that. So Skype is really the best way to help me out. Also, I will share my screen with you and you just explain to me whatever.

Please help this guy out.

Post below your Skype and i will add you as soon as possible. Thanks. [/center]

Read full topic
